long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HRzilla - Your AI Job Application Coach
Transform your job search with AI-powered insights. Get instant feedback on job fit, optimize your resume, and boost your chances of landing your dream job.

HRzilla is your intelligent career companion that revolutionizes how you approach job applications. Using advanced AI technology, it analyzes job postings in real-time and compares them with your resume to provide actionable insights and strategic recommendations.
